resources.string:
Your android device must have either internal or external storage. Thats where the bundled 3D models (.obj) are to be stored

If you want to load your own models, just download them to your android device in some folder

To load the model just click on "Load" and select the file you want to open

Once the model is loaded, you can pinch to zoom, rotate model with your finger and rotate the screen with 2 fingers

If you need more help feel free to ask me at andresoviedo@gmail.com

This application allows you to load 3D object models (currently only wavefront .obj format is supported).

The purpose of this application is to learn how to code in android and how the OpenGL language works.

The code for this application is open source. The complete source code can be found at https://github.com/andresoviedo/android-3DModel

Any comments or suggestions are welcome. Feel free to contact me at andresoviedo@gmail.com

For more info about me visit www.andresoviedo.org
